summary: This document appears to be a staff assignment or duty roster for a correctional facility (likely MCC New York) for the third quarter of 2019, covering dates in July and August. It shows daily post assignments, days off, sick leave, and leave without pay for staff members, and was generated on August 12, 2019.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: The facility for which the staff assignments are recorded.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for a correctional facility, likely the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The log covers the third quarter of 2019 (July-August), which is the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death.
Assignments include posts like SHU #1 (Special Housing Unit), 11 SOUTH, 5 SOUTH, and 10 SOUTH, indicating different units or wings within the facility.
Staff codes like 'DAN', 'MAN', and 'OTEAN' appear, likely representing officer identifiers or position codes.
The document shows various staff statuses including regular duty, days off, sick leave, and leave without pay (LWOP).
